information: The company NGT GMBH NEUE GUSSTECHNIK WEHRSDORF, is a Manufacturer/ Producer, founded in 1894, which operates in the Steel industry. It also operates in the Iron, special grade and pig iron, Casting of special and high-grade steels, Aluminium and aluminium alloys, and Foundries, aluminium industries. It is based in Sohland, Germany.
